remarks: The algebraic closure is the ring closure when the generating set is expanded to include all scalars. _EDITORIAL_ :  In light of this, is ` AlgSpan ` independently needed?  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Mar-2015.)
statement:
aspval2.a $e |- A = ( AlgSpan ` W ) $.
aspval2.c $e |- C = ( algSc ` W ) $.
aspval2.r $e |- R = ( mrCls ` ( SubRing ` W ) ) $.
aspval2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
aspval2 $p |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ( A ` S ) = ( R ` ( ran C u. S ) ) ) $.
